NK002(kha)006:0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la bstod pa smon lam
NK002(kha)006:1: du bya ba gzhan phan pad dkar phreng ba bzhugs
NK002(kha)006:2: so // na mo ar+ya lo ki shwa ra ye /
NK002(kha)006:3: dus gsum rgyal ba'i brtse chen ye shes gter //
NK002(kha)006:4: snying rje'i dbang phyug sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i skur //
NK002(kha)006:5: yongs bzhes mkha' khyab 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pu //
NK002(kha)006:6: mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)006:7: gang khyod gdod nas bskal chen 'dzin pa ru //
NK002(kha)006:8: 'od zer kun 'phags dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes //
NK002(kha)006:9: mngon sangs rgyas kyang slar sems can don //
NK002(kha)006:10: rgyal sras gzhon nur ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)006:11: 'khor los bsgyur ba rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi //
NK002(kha)006:12: sras kyi thu bor gyur nas 'gro drug gi //
NK002(kha)006:13: sdug bsngal rtag tu gzigs pa'i mig mi 'dzum //
NK002(kha)006:14: spyan ras gzigs su grags la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)006:15: khyod kyi gzhan phan rjes song dam baca'i dpung //
NK002(kha)006:16: rgyal sras gzhan gyi khur du mi bzod pas //
NK002(kha)006:17: srid 'gro ma stoong de srid rang nyid kyi //
NK002(kha)006:18: zhi bde dgra ltar spangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)006:19: mkha' khyab zhing du de snyed skus bkod pa //
NK002(kha)006:20: snang yang zhing 'dir 'dzam gling shar lho'i mtshams //
NK002(kha)006:21: chu gter che ngogs gru 'dzin dpal gyi ri //
NK002(kha)006:22: rgyal ba'i zhing khams che der skye bar shog /
NK002(kha)006:23: las kyi sgrib pa mi 'gyur ri rgyal de'i //
NK002(kha)006:24: rtsa bar rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma yis //
NK002(kha)006:25: klu yi tshogs la chos ston mthong ba dang //
NK002(kha)006:26: sgrib pa dag nas ye shes mthong gyur cig /
NK002(kha)006:27: ri yi sked par 'phags ma khro gnyer can //
NK002(kha)006:28: lha min gnod sbyin tshogs la chos ston pa //
NK002(kha)006:29: nges par mthong nas ye shes brtan gyur zhing //
NK002(kha)006:30: mi skye'i chos la bzod pa thob par shog /
NK002(kha)006:31: ri yi rtse mor 'phags pa'i gzhal med khang //
NK002(kha)006:32: smon lam mthu yi 'phrul pa'i zhing khams mchog /
NK002(kha)006:33: rin chen las grub sgo 'phar stong ldan pa //
NK002(kha)006:34: 'phags mas lam sna drangs te bgrod gyur cig /
NK002(kha)006:35: de tshe sgo re phye bas ting 'dzin re //
NK002(kha)006:36: 'thob cing lha klu dri za mi'am ci //
NK002(kha)006:37: grub pa'i rig 'dzin 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus //
NK002(kha)006:38: 'phags pa'i gzugs sku lham mer mthong gyur cig /
NK002(kha)006:39: gang la theg pa gsum gyis chos 'khor gyis //
NK002(kha)006:40: blo dang mtshams par rnam grol la 'god cing //
NK002(kha)006:41: bdag gi sgrib gnyis mun pa der song te //
NK002(kha)006:42: byang chub lam du dbugs 'byin thob gyur cig /
NK002(kha)006:43: na lan d+ha ru tsan+t+ra go mi la //
NK002(kha)006:44: dngos su rtsod pa'i rig pa slab ji bzhin //
NK002(kha)006:45: bdag kyang zhal gyi bdud rtsi nyer gsos nas //
NK002(kha)006:46: mngon rtogs yon tan long tsho rdzogs par shog /
NK002(kha)006:47: zhi ba'i go cha brlabs chen bka' thub kyis //
NK002(kha)006:48: 'phags pa lha lnga 'dzam gling spyan drangs nas //
NK002(kha)006:49: gdul bya'i re ba bskang ltar bdag nyid kyang //
NK002(kha)006:50: gzhan don spro bas 'phags mchog mnyes gyur cig /
NK002(kha)006:51: sbyin sogs legs spyod lnga yi gru gzings che //
NK002(kha)006:52: shes rab zab mo'i ba dan g.yo ba yis //
NK002(kha)006:53: srid pa'i chu gter pha rol brgal gyur nas //
NK002(kha)006:54: 'gro sgrol ded dpon khyed dang mtshungs par shog /
NK002(kha)006:55: zhing khams de na 'phags pa zla ba yis //
NK002(kha)006:56: lus ma spangs par byang chub spyod mchog gis //
NK002(kha)006:57: khyod mnyes mdzad bzhin bdag kyang de bzhin du //
NK002(kha)006:58: gyur nas mnyes pa 'ba' zhig bsgrub par shog /
NK002(kha)006:59: nam zhig rdzogs smin sbyang gsum mthar phyin nas //
NK002(kha)006:60: ma rnams 'khor ba dong sprugs gyur gyis bar //
NK002(kha)006:61: mgon po spyan ra sa gzigs dang mi 'bral zhing //
NK002(kha)006:62: spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzad dang mtshungs par shog /
NK002(kha)006:63: dge rtsa 'dis mtshon bdag dang sems can gyis //
NK002(kha)006:64: dus gsum bsags pa'i legs spyad gcig bsdoms mthus //
NK002(kha)006:65: ji ltar smon lam btab bzhin 'grub gyur nas //
NK002(kha)006:66: 'gro rnams ma lus sgrol ba'i dpal thob shog /
NK002(kha)006:67: ces thugs rje chen po'i bsnyungs gnas kyi mthar sbyar
NK002(kha)006:68: rgyu'i smon tshig gcig dgos zhes rang gi slob ma
NK002(kha)006:69: sngags 'chang rab 'byams pa bsod nams mchog ldan dang
NK002(kha)006:70: blo bzang phun tshogs kyi bskul ngor rgyal khams pa
NK002(kha)006:71: tshe dbang mchog grub kyi thun mtshams su brjod pas
